text: Bernardo Alfonsel Lopez (born 24 February 1954) is a Spanish former racing cyclist. He rode in seven editions of the Tour de France and seven editions of the Vuelta a España between 1977 and 1986. He also rode in the road race event at the 1976 Summer Olympics. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish male cyclists Category:Sportspeople from Madrid Category:Tour de France cyclists Category:Vuelta a España cyclists Category:Cyclists at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic cyclists of Spain
title: Bernardo Alfonsel
